product_name: The Roadside Road Bike Maintenance Manual
long_description: A handy, lay-flat guide that covers everything from flats to tool selection,. Author: Mike Davis and Guy Andrews. Softcover; 128 pages; color photographs. Bloomsbury Publishing LLC; copyright 2014. Includes tips on fixing a flat, repairing a chain, straightening a rim, adjusting and replacing cables, and lubing cables, chains and cassettes. Also includes choosing a saddle, handlebars pedals and cleats, as well as packing the tools you'll need. Includes a section on administering emergency procedures and first aid. Measures approximately 8 x 5.5 in. with a tough cover so you can bring it with you.
short_description: A handy, lay-flat guide that covers everything from flats to tool selection, The Roadside Road Bike Maintenance Manual offers quick fixes to keep you and your bike on the road.
